name: 'Star Trek' Artificial Intelligence Online Trivia | Television | 15 Questions

questions.text: TNG: Easy one: what is the name of the android science officer?
questions.explanation:
Data.

	Played fantastically well by Brent Spiner. He also plays Data's brother Lore and their creator, Dr. Noonian Soong.

questions.text: TOS ep 'The Apple': what is the name of the lizard-headed computer that enslaves a tribal race to feed it, in return for making the planet a paradise?
questions.explanation:
Vaal.

	In this episode, look for David Soul (Starsky and Hutch) as one of the villagers. (He's the one that experimentally kisses a girl.)

questions.text: TOS ep 'Return of the Archons': what is the name of the omnipresent computer that controls the populace of Beta III?
questions.explanation:
Landru.

	Landru was the scientist that programmed the computer 6,000 years before to lead the populace to a peaceful existence. Unfortunately, the computer ends up forbidding independent thought, making the citizens as robotic as the computer.

questions.text: TOS ep 'The Changeling': what is the name of the errant space probe from Earth's past that's prime directive has been accidentally altered to basically kill all biological life?
questions.explanation:
Nomad.

	It's original programming was to find new life and report back to Earth. A damaged Nomad met an alien probe, Tan Ru, who was to sterilize soil samples. The two fixed each other, combining their programming to find life and sterilize it. Capt. Kirk's name being similar to Nomad's creator, Jackson Roykirk, gave them the edge to destroy Nomad before he made it back to Earth.

questions.text: VOY: The Doctor is a holographic computer program designed to replace a ship's doctor on a temporary basis only. What is the 3-letter acronym used to refer to him?
questions.explanation:
EMH.

	It stands for Emergency Medical Hologram. There is a duplicate one installed on the USS Enterprise-E. It was first used to slow down the invading Borg so the sick bay personnel and patients could escape. He protested, 'I'm a doctor, not a doorstop!'

questions.text: TNG eps 'Elementary, Dear Data': what is the name of the holofiction character that Geordi accidentally gives rudimentary sentience to?
questions.explanation:
moriarty.

	Played by Daniel Davis (Niles on The Nanny). He reprised the role in ep 'Ship in a Bottle'.

questions.text: VOY ep 'Message in a Bottle': The doctor is transmitted to a Starfleet vessel in the Alpha Quadrant, the Prometheus. There he meets his 'replacement', the Mark II version of his program. What actor plays this new doctor?
questions.explanation:
Andy Dick.

	He also played Matthew on 'Newsradio'.

questions.text: VOY ep 'Revulsion': what is the name of the homicidal hologram that Torres and The Doctor meet on the Serosian ship?
questions.explanation:
Dejaren.

	Played by Leland Orser (Lieutenant DeWindt in 'Saving Private Ryan').

questions.text: TOS ep 'The Ultimate Computer': the M5 Multitronic computer was created by this computer genius:
questions.explanation:
Richard Daystrom.

	Played by William Marshall. He went on to play Blacula in two blaxploitation movies.

questions.text: TOS ep 'For the World Is Hollow and I Have Touched the Sky': by what name is Yonada's control computer called by High Priestess Natira?
TOS ep 'Requiem For Methuselah': what is the name Flint gives his android companion?
questions.explanation:
Rayna.

	She was played by Louise Sorel (Vivian Alamain on 'Days of our Lives').

questions.text: TNG ep 'The Offspring': Data's 'daughter', Lal (Hallie Todd), dies because:
questions.correct: she develops emotions that overload her neural pathways
options: she takes a phaser blast aimed at Data
she accidentally takes a drink of water
she locks herself in the warp core to fix it because no human could survive it
questions.explanation: she develops emotions that overload her neural pathways.

questions.text: TOS ep 'I, Mudd': on Harry Mudd's planet of androids, he mainly created beautiful female series. However, there is only one of the kind that hijacked the Enterprise and proves to be the central processor of their collective intelligence. His name is:
Still on Harry Mudd's planet: Harry created only one of a certain female. Her name was:
questions.explanation:
Stella.

	His shrewish wife he deserted. He programmed it to being nagging him when he said, 'Stella, dear,' until she was told, 'Shut up, Stella!' Once Kirk and Co. regained control of their ship, they left Harry on the planet, but with 500 copies of Stella, none of which were programmed to shut up. (Stella was played by Kay Elliott.)

questions.text: This device, when asked if it was machine or being, replies, 'I am both, and neither.'
questions.explanation:
The Guardian of Forever.

	TOS ep 'City on the Edge of Forever'. Bart LaRue provided the voice of the Guardian. He also did several other voices on TOS, including Yarnek ('The Savage Curtain') and Trelane's father ('The Squire of Gothos').
